definition: to fall ill/to be stricken with an illness
illness/CL:場|场[chang2]/disease/to fall ill/defect
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation

sentences.english: Half an hour later she fell ill, ” the maid said.
sentences.chinese: 半個小時之後她便病倒了”女傭說。

sentences.english: Four weeks later, another titi monkey came down with the same symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 4周以後，另一個蒂蒂猴患同樣的症狀而病倒。

sentences.english: She is down with la grippe and so is her cook .
sentences.chinese: 她在患流行性感冒，她家的廚子也病倒了。

sentences.english: If you keep burning the candle at both ends with work and study, you'll fall sick sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 你要是繼續這樣不眠不休地工作和讀書，遲早會病倒。

sentences.english: He soon after and did not recover.
sentences.chinese: 不久後他就病倒了，而且一病不起。

sentences.english: Buddy fell ill and within months the dog was dead.
sentences.chinese: 巴帝“突然間病倒，又在幾個月後死去。

sentences.english: Last year, Kim vanished again - but this time because he was ill.
sentences.chinese: 去年金正日再次消失，但是這次是因爲他病倒了。

sentences.english: Some people who felt well in the morning became sick by noon and were dead by nightfall.
sentences.chinese: 有些人早上感覺還不錯，到中午病倒，傍晚就死了。

sentences.english: Tom fell ill with a bad cold.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆因重感冒而病倒了。

sentences.english: Atzel dreams to live in paradise and becomes ill.
sentences.chinese: 阿採爾一直夢想去天堂生活，並且因此病倒了。

sentences.english: She was knocked over by fever.
Her illness brought home to him how much he depended on her.
sentences.chinese: 她一病倒才使他深切體會到自己對她依賴程度有多大。

sentences.english: He worked in the rain for such a long time and ended up ill yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他在雨中工作了那麼久，最後病倒了。

sentences.english: Mother Plutarque, whose health was declining, was ill and in bed.
sentences.chinese: 體力日漸衰退的普盧塔克媽媽正病倒在牀上。

sentences.english: Back in 1950 my beautiful wife Mildred became ill.
sentences.chinese: 1950年，我美麗的妻子米爾德里德病倒了。

sentences.english: The bud ill, fish is cancer is terminal, alone accept.
sentences.chinese: 牛一蓓病倒了，查出是癌症晚期，單獨接受。

definition: seriously ill
to fall gravely ill, never to recover (idiom)
serious illness
to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
to fall ill
to be ill/to be in bad health
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem
to accumulate work causes sickness (idiom); to fall ill from constant overwork
ill in bed/bed-ridden
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to die of an illness
fever/high temperature
to recuperate/to convalesce/to take care of one's health after illness
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
to pass away/to die
to fall ill
